caption.center: MIRIAM GORE, Employee v. MYRTLE/MUELLER, Employer TRAVELERS INSURANCE

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 11th day of August 2006 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S.7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of March 2007.Page 1
